SELECT bb.user_id,bb.user_name,bb.user_gettime,bb.user_finishtime FROM(SELECT aa.*,u.user_name from (select t.*,tu.user_gettime,tu.user_finishtime,tu.user_status,tu.user_id from p_allpertask t LEFT JOIN p_allpertask_user tu ON tu.allpertask_id=t.allpertask_id) aa LEFT JOIN v_userset u on aa.user_id=u.user_id where aa.allpertask_status <2 and aa.user_status!=0)bb where bb.allpertask_id=#{allpertask_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
